reviewText: This is one of the most poorly write movie ever. I wish I would have never gotten it.
Cui Zi'en on familiar territory with this closely observed story of family and gay attachments.  Great to see gay themed films coming out of communist China.

This movie was terrible! The plot was off, there were scenes that looked like they were cut off and the acting was subpar. The brother/sister development was non-existent and overall it was a terrible movie that didn't make sense. I didn't expect for it to be this horrible.
This is definitely a waste of money .The acting was very poor. The quality of the production was very ,very poor. Wasted money definitely.
Nice plot, but the development of the characters seemed flat. Perhaps there was not enough subtlety in the characters. Although there was drama, it seemed staged, unnatural?

GREAT MOVIE.IF YOU WANT TO SEE CENTERAL ASIA AFTER THE FALL OF THE SOVIET UNION THIS IS IT. THE YOUNG BOY IS A SUPER ACTOR.NEAR THE END OF THE MOVIE THE DOCTOR SAID TO THE BOY,  "DO YOU HAVE A SEX-LIFE" THE BOY'S MOTHER ANSWER "NO". THE LOOK ON THE BOY'S FACE IS WORTH THE PRICE OF THE DVD. YOU WILL HAVE TO SEE THE MOVIE TO KNOW WHAT I MEAN.
